alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 4-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 4-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids containing an amine group attached to the benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Aminobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, which consists of a monocyclic benzene moiety that carries a sulfonyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenesulfonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears at least one carboxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an aminobenzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Aniline and substituted anilines

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic amines where the amine group is secondary and linked on one end to a phenyl group and on the other end, to an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenylalkylamines

alternative_parents.description: Secondary alkylarylamines with the general formula HN(R)R' (R = alkyl, R' = aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary alkylarylamines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more chlorine atoms attached to a benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Chlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonamide functional group, an amide of sulfonic acid with the general structure R1S(=O)2N(R2)R3 (R1=alkyl, aryl; R2,R3=H, alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonamides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a furan ring, which is a five-member aromatic ring with one oxygen atom, four carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Furans

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an amine group, which is indirectly attached to a carbonyl via an intervening vinyl (>C=C<) moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Vinylogous amides

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds with the general formula RS(=O)(=O)N(R')R''  (R = organyl, R'-R\" = any atom but N).
alternative_parents.name: Aminosulfonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds that contain at least one carboxyl group and one amino group.
alternative_parents.name: Amino acids

alternative_parents.description: Carboxylic acids containing exactly one carboxyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Monocarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as aminobenzenesulfonamides. These are organic compounds containing a benzenesulfonamide moiety with an amine group attached to the benzene ring.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a benzenesulfonamide moiety with an amine group attached to the benzene ring.
direct_parent.name: Aminobenzenesulfonamides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.
subclass.name: Benzenesulfonamides

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
